Package org.stripesstuff.stripersist

Interface Summary
StripersistInit At startup Stripersist will search for classes implementing StripersistInit using the standard Stripes auto-discovery method.
 

Class Summary
Dao Stripersist's Dao provides a simple generified static DAO.
EntityFormatter EntityFormatter returns an entity's primary key as a string so Stripes can insert it into web pages.
EntityTypeConverter EntityTypeConverter retrieves an object of the specified target type by converting the value parameter into the primary key type for the class and calling EntityManager.find(Class, Object).
EntityUtil EntityUtil provides some convenience functions for working with entities.
Stripersist Stripersist provides a simple way to use JPA in Stripes applications.
